meanings.definition: A person or thing that duplicates.
meanings.sent1: The duplicators in the office make copies of important papers.
meanings.sent2: She is a duplicators, always creating multiple versions of her artwork.
meanings.sent3: The duplicators at the party were the twins who dressed alike.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to mimic others made her a duplicators in the world of impressions.
meanings.sent5: The machine acted like a duplicators, producing exact replicas of the original document.

meanings.definition: A machine that duplicates documents or images.
meanings.sent1: The duplicators in the library are used to copy old manuscripts.
meanings.sent2: He bought a duplicators for his home office to make copies of important papers.
meanings.sent3: The duplicators went haywire and started printing random patterns.
meanings.sent4: The duplicators hummed softly as it reproduced the photograph perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The duplicators worked tirelessly, churning out copies of the report.
